column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////In a huge open space that dwarfs the original
column2: they have captured some of the best elements of Newport and expanded upon them (larger whiskey room and huge patios to name a few). Some of the best bites we had included the pork belly poutine
column4: tomato bisque and the sweet potato Mac and cheese that our table figured had to be a delicious accident that happened at Thanksgiving.
